name: Portobello Mushrooms (Baby Portobello)
benefits: Portobello mushrooms provide a meaty texture and umami flavor that makes them particularly satiating in plant-based dishes. Low in calories but high in satisfaction, they're excellent for weight loss when prepared without added fats. Featured in Italian-inspired dishes like bolognese sauce.
amount: 8 ounces (225g) finely chopped or sliced per 4 servings
